pricing_seo_title: Stocknear Pricing - Pro Stock Analysis Plans & Premium Features
pricing_seo_description: Unlock premium stock analysis features with Stocknear Pro and Lifetime plans. Get unlimited access to advanced tools, real-time data, AI forecasts, options flow, and institutional-grade analytics. Start your free trial today.
pricing_hero_title: Upgrade for real-time edge on every trade.
pricing_hero_subtitle: Start free, upgrade anytime. Every tier is built for focus: clean data, smart alerts, and tools that save hours.
pricing_basic_subtitle: Everything you need to explore the platform.
pricing_faq_subtitle: Clear answers to the most common questions about trials, billing, and upgrades.
pricing_faq_q1_title: What are the advantages of Stocknear Service?
pricing_faq_q1_answer: Stocknear Service provides simplified, actionable trading data and an extensive tool suite for every investor, featuring exclusive, high-quality Wall Street data at an unmatched price. We also offer proprietary AI Agents and models for accurate analyzes, all within a single unified platform.
pricing_faq_q2_title: What are credits and how do they work?
pricing_faq_q2_answer: On Stocknear, certain premium features have monthly usage limits. Credits represent your available usage for these features. The more credits you have, the more you can access advanced tools like chatting with our AI Agent and bulk downloading data. Your credits reset monthly based on your subscription plan, with higher-tier plans offering more credits for increased usage.
pricing_faq_q3_title: What's included with Premium Discord Channel Access?
pricing_faq_q3_answer: Gain access to real-time options flow from major institutional players, live dark pool activity, instant earnings updates, market-moving news, and much more â€” all designed to keep you ahead of the market.
pricing_faq_q4_title: How does the 7 day trial work?
pricing_faq_q4_answer: You are entitled to one FREE 7 day trial. You can cancel anytime within your trial period with no obligations. If you go past 7 days without cancelling, your account will be automatically billed.
pricing_faq_q5_title: Can I change my plan at any time?
pricing_faq_q5_answer: Yes, you can easily upgrade your plan on your Account Page. Or simply reach out to us via email, and we'll take care of it for you.
pricing_faq_q6_title: Are there any commissions in addition to the subscription plans?
pricing_faq_q6_answer: No, we do not charge any additional commissions or hidden fees beyond our subscription plans.
pricing_faq_q7_answer: We offer a 30 day money back guarantee, no questions asked. Just send an email to {email} and you will get a full refund.
pricing_faq_q8_answer: We support Credit Card and Paypal payments.
pricing_faq_q9_title: Can I cancel at any time?
pricing_faq_q9_answer: Of course. There is a "Cancel Subscription" button in your account area that you get access to after signing up. You can also send us a message and we will cancel for you.
pricing_upgrade_modal_content: To upgrade your account from Plus to Pro, please contact us via email and we will handle the upgrade for you.
